items: Robust Save/Open system that preserves Markdown syntax perfectly
Added 'Paste' to context menu
Distinct typography for Bold (White), Italic (Blue), and Bold+Italic (Pink)
Custom Context Menu (Right-Click) with Cut and Copy options
Seamless integration with editor theme
Complete visual overhaul of Help and Changelog modals with 'Glassmorphism' and 'Tailwind-inspired' design
Added Badge styling for change categories (Added, Fixed, Changed)
Help modal now parses markdown formatting correctly
Changelog now highlights major milestones with distinct cards
Refreshed Changelog UI with modern styling and milestone tracking
Added visual distinctions for major version releases
Added support for Standard Links (`[text](url)`)
Added support for Title Links (`[text](url "title")`)
Added support for Autolinks (`<url>`, `<email>`)
Links are fully interactive (clickable) and support nested formatting like bold text
Added support for Horizontal Rules (`***`, `---`, `___`)
Implemented stylized separator lines that hide syntax when active
Added Inline Code Highlighting (`code`) support
Implemented 'Encode Sans SC' font for code blocks with distinct background styling
Fixed critical styling bug where the unorder list point (dot) would float in the middle of the editor
Fixed 'Enter' key behavior: Pressing Enter now correctly creates a new, clean paragraph line, exiting Lists, Headers, and Quotes properly
Added support for Ordered Lists (1. Item)
Added support for Unordered Lists (-, *, + Item)
Implemented 'Tailwind-like' styling for lists with hanging indents and custom markers
Fixed Bold text color inside headers (now inherits header color)
Fixed Bold+Italic (***) text rendering to be correctly bold and italic
Added Tokenizer Engine to prevent complex formatting collisions
Fixed critical bug where text would disappear if formatting syntax was ambiguous
Headers now support Bold/Italic formatting
Fixed Bold (**) and Bold+Italic (***) formatting visibility issues
Improved regex ordering to prevent formatting conflicts
Support for multi-paragraph Blockquotes (using empty > lines)
True WYSIWYG: Markdown syntax characters (**chars**, #) are now hidden automatically
ContentEditable support for richer editing experience
Removed raw markdown syntax from view (visible only when editing plain text files externally)
Improved cursor handling for formatted text
Live syntax highlighting: Editor now formats markdown in-place (Discord-style)
Support for Headers, Bold, Italic, Code, Lists, Quotes, and Links highlighting
Removed separate Markdown Preview pane and button (always in live preview mode)
Editor input is now transparent with a syntax-highlighted backdrop
Markdown Live Preview: Toggle via new eye icon in toolbar
Split-view mode for side-by-side editing and previewing
Markdown syntax support (Headers, Lists, Code, Links, Images)
Status indicator is back and now always visible (ghosted when saved)
Bumped version to 0.1.0 to mark significant feature update
Editor area now supports split layout
Swapped toolbar buttons: File operations (New, Open, Save) are now on the left
Swapped toolbar buttons: Help and Changelog are now on the right
Improved editor visibility: Dark background with light text
Editor scaling fixed to always fill the application window
Disabled manual resizing of the text editor
Moved Filename to the bottom left status bar
Moved Help and Changelog buttons to top left
Moved New, Open, Save buttons to top right
Removed Save As button (shortcut Ctrl+Shift+S still works)
Status indicator is now larger and pulses when unsaved
Added status tooltip to indicator dot
Font switcher button in status bar
Three font options: Headland One, Rajdhani, Noto Sans Multani
Font preference saved to localStorage
Next Font button with visual indicator
Removed default menu bar (View, Window, Help)
Moved Help and Changelog buttons to the left of toolbar
Reorganized toolbar layout for better UX
Updated typography system to support multiple fonts
In-app Help and Changelog viewers
Help button in toolbar
Changelog button in toolbar
Custom typography system with Headland One font
New color palette (text, background, primary, secondary, accent)
Font family changed to Headland One (serif)
Color scheme updated to custom palette
Font sizes now use rem-based scale
Editor font size increased to 1.333rem
Complete Electron text editor application
File operations (New, Open, Save, Save As)
Keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+N, Ctrl+O, Ctrl+S, Ctrl+Shift+S)
Modern dark theme UI
Real-time statistics (lines, words, characters)
Security-first architecture with context isolation
TypeScript-based implementation
Linux packaging support (AppImage, .deb)
